def get_queues(prefix=None): """ Gets a list of SQS queues. When a prefix is specified, only queues with names that start with the prefix are returned.
:param prefix: The prefix used to restrict the list of returned queues. :return: A list of Queue objects. """ if prefix: queue_iter = sqs.queues.filter(QueueNamePrefix=prefix) else: queue_iter = sqs.queues.all() queues = list(queue_iter) if queues: logger.info("Got queues: %s", ', '.join([q.url for q in queues])) else: logger.warning("No queues found.") return queues
